title: Textile, ca. 1792
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave foundation
dimensions:
H x W: 50.8 x 40 cm (20 x 15 3/4 in.)
Repeat H: 26.7 cm (10 1/2 in.)
description: Fragment of printed cotton with a small-scale pattern of overlapping triangular and scalloped arch forms, each filled with finely detailed flowers, leaves, coral, or birds. Printed in black, purple, blue, green, yellow, and several shades of red and pink on an off-white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1792.
ca. 1792. Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave foundation. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-148.
